SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards

Class Pattern

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards.Pattern
public class Pattern extends Object
A pattern object describes a sub-matrix of the shelf which is used as a mask during the pattern matching. The frame of the patterns are dimensioned to host the covered cells.

Graphical representation of a diagonal pattern:
OXXX
XOXX
XXOX
XXXO
height = 4
lenght= 4
coveredCells=[[0,0],[1,1],[2,2],[3,3]]
Author:
Daniele Ferrario
